name: Soul Rebellion
description:
Soul Rebellion is an Action-Adventure game with a mysterious story full of plot twists and humor.
This game is in development by one person and in preparation for a funding campaign.Story:In the lands of Armelia, 10 people have been possessed by the soul of ancient heroes. The culprit is a mysterious sorcerer who has forced them to participate in a game to return to normality: the assassination of the Armelian Empire's King.Swap between two souls!Swap between Sigma, a skilled swordsman and "Lord Sideon", a powerful mage who has possessed Sigma's body. Combine their skills in real time to defeat enemies and solve puzzles.Release your soul!Fly freely through the stages and interact with the environment releasing your own soul. You can destroy objects, move them to another place and return to your body at any time. Get more skills progressing in the story.
